short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension to transcribe an open tab's audio using Aiera's ASR

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension targets our customers and its sole objective is to make easier to transcribe an audio via our "Aiera" platform. This extension cannot be used unless you sign up with "Aiera".
